A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a huge letdown and a smack in the face to all the fans who have enjoyed these movies for the past 40+ years. Luke was made into a horrible character and the hero that many children grew up with and looked up to was made out to be a coward. There were many political opinions that were forcefully put into the movie\, many of which actually conflicted with core themes and ideas of the good guys\, especially the weapons trading with the X-wings vs Tie fighters! \nI just hope that JJ Abrams can redeem the next movie\, I'd even be willing to have George Lucas come back and direct the next movie\, this one was so bad!
